LanguageData.rjw_broken.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] suffered some terrible things, [PAWN_pronoun] looks rather emaciated.
LanguageData.rjw_broken.BackstoryDef.title: Broken Nymph
LanguageData.rjw_chatty.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: No one can be more loquacious than [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] has a flexible tongue, a sharp mind, and hot lips.
LanguageData.rjw_chatty.BackstoryDef.title: Chatty Nymph
LanguageData.rjw_curious.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loves crafting various things, especially things that provide new experiences.
LanguageData.rjw_curious.BackstoryDef.title: Curious Nymph
LanguageData.rjw_feisty.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a conqueror by nature and will punch you in a face if you try to say "No" to [PAWN_possessive] advances.
LanguageData.rjw_feisty.BackstoryDef.title: Feisty Nymph
LanguageData.rjw_homekeeper.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to be a housekeeper. Would you like dinner? A bath? Or perhaps...[PAWN_possessive]?.
LanguageData.rjw_homekeeper.BackstoryDef.title: Homekeeper Nymph
LanguageData.rjw_tender.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has a pair of charming eyes, and [PAWN_possessive] voice is soft and sweet. Due to [PAWN_possessive] previous nurse job, [PAWN_pronoun] tends people quite well.
LanguageData.rjw_tender.BackstoryDef.title: Tender Nymph
LanguageData.rjw_vatgrown_sex_slave.BackstoryDef.base: [PAWN_nameDef] was made to be a sex toy, rather than a human. During [PAWN_possessive] growing period, [PAWN_pronoun] was taught plenty of social and sex related skills to satisfy any demands of its owners.
